Check.CheckDescription: UseCase diagrams with more than 15 Use Cases

QueryToFindElements.Main: SELECT d.ea_guid AS ItemGuid FROM ((((((t_diagram d INNER JOIN t_package p on p.Package_ID = d.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p1 on package_p1.package_id = p.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p2 on package_p2.package_id = package_p1.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p3 on package_p3.package_id = package_p2.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p4 ON Package_p4.Package_id = Package_p3.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_Package Package_p5 ON Package_p5.Package_id = Package_p4.parent_id) WHERE d.Diagram_Type = 'Use Case'

Filters.Change: AND d.ea_guid in ( SELECT d.ea_guid FROM t_diagram d INNER JOIN t_diagramobjects do ON d.Diagram_ID = do.Diagram_ID INNER JOIN t_object oUC ON oUC.Object_ID = do.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties opUC ON oUC.Object_ID = opUC.Object_ID WHERE opUC.Property = 'CR' AND opUC.Value = '#SearchTerm#' )
Filters.Release: AND d.ea_guid in ( SELECT d.ea_guid FROM t_diagram d INNER JOIN t_diagramobjects do ON d.Diagram_ID = do.Diagram_ID INNER JOIN t_object oUC ON oUC.Object_ID = do.Object_ID INNER JOIN t_objectproperties opUC ON oUC.Object_ID = opUC.Object_ID WHERE opUC.Property = 'CR' AND opUC.Value in ( SELECT oChange.ea_guid FROM t_object oRelease INNER JOIN t_connector con ON oRelease.Object_ID = con.End_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object oChange ON con.Start_Object_ID = oChange.Object_ID WHERE oRelease.ea_guid = '#SearchTerm#' ) )

QueryToCheckFoundElements.Main: SELECT d.Name AS ItemName , 'diagram' as ItemType , d.ea_guid AS ItemGuid , d.Diagram_Type AS ElementType , d.StereoType AS ElementStereotype , p.name AS PackageName , package_p1.name AS PackageParentLevel1 , package_p2.name AS PackageParentLevel2 , package_p3.name AS PackageParentLevel3 , package_p4.name AS PackageParentLevel4 , package_p5.name AS PackageParentLevel5 FROM ((((((t_diagram d INNER JOIN t_package p on p.Package_ID = d.Package_ID) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p1 on package_p1.package_id = p.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p2 on package_p2.package_id = package_p1.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p3 on package_p3.package_id = package_p2.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p4 on package_p4.package_id = package_p3.parent_id) LEFT JOIN t_package package_p5 on package_p5.package_id = package_p4.parent_id) WHERE d.ea_guid in (#ElementGuids#) AND d.ea_guid in ( SELECT d.ea_guid FROM dbo.t_diagram d INNER JOIN t_diagramobjects do ON d.Diagram_ID=do.Diagram_ID INNER JOIN t_object o ON do.Object_ID = o.Object_ID WHERE d.Diagram_Type='Use Case' AND o.Object_Type='UseCase' GROUP BY d.ea_guid HAVING COUNT(o.ea_guid) > '15' )

Check.Rationale: A Use Case diagram should have max. 15 Use Cases.
Check.ProposedSolution: Split up the UseCase diagram into multiple UseCase diagrams
